" ====================

" ===

filetype on
filetype indent on
filetype plugin on
filetype plugin indent on
set mouse=a
set encoding=utf-8

set clipboard=unnamed

" Prevent incorrect backgroung rendering
let &t_ut=â€˜â€™

" ===

set number
set relativenumber
set ruler
set cursorline
syntax enable
syntax on

" ===

" Better tab
set expandtab
set tabstop=2
set shiftwidth=2
set softtabstop=2
set list
set listchars=tab:â–¸\ ,trail:â–«
set scrolloff=5 " é¡µé¢ä¸Šä¸‹å¤š5è¡Œ

" Prevent auto line split
set wrap
set tw=0

set indentexpr=

set backspace=indent,eol,start

set foldmethod=indent
set foldlevel=99

" Show command autocomplete

" ===

" Set as
let mapleader=" "

" Column (:) mods
map ; :
map q; q:

" Save & quit

map S :w

" Open the vimrc file anytime

" Insert Key

" Search

" Duplicate words
map fd /(<\w+>)_s*\1

" Others

" ===

" ^
" u
" < n i >
" e
" v

" noremap n h
" noremap e j
" noremap i l
" U/E keys for 5 times u/e (faster navigation)
noremap U 5k
noremap E 5j
" N key: go to the start of the line
" noremap N 0
" I key: go to the end of the line
" noremap I $

" Faster in-line navigation
noremap W 5w
noremap B 5b
" set h (same as n, cursor left) to â€˜end of wordâ€™
" noremap h e

" Ctrl + U or E will move up/down the view port without moving the cursor
noremap 5
noremap 5
inoremap 5a
inoremap 5a

" ===
" === Window management
" ===
" Use + new arrow keys for moving the cursor around windows
map w w
map u k
map e j
map n h
map i l
"map r r

" Disabling the default s key
noremap s

" split the screens to up (horizontal), down (horizontal), left (vertical), right (vertical)
map su :set nosplitbelow:split:set splitbelow
map se :set splitbelow:split
map sn :set nosplitright:vsplit:set splitright
map si :set splitright:vsplit

" Resize splits with arrow keys
map :res +5
map :res -5
map :vertical resize-5
map :vertical resize+5

" Place the two screens up and down
noremap sh tK
" Place the two screens side by side
noremap sv tH

" Rotate screens
noremap srh bK
noremap srv bH

" ===

" ===

map tu :tabe
" Move around tabs with tn and ti
map tn :-tabnext
map ti :+tabnext
" Move the tabs with tmn and tmi
map tmn :-tabmove
map tmi :+tabmove

" ===

" ===
